body:
Changed the check to compare `data_ptr` for input and output Tensors. Tested that it works with views that share the same underlying storage:

![screen shot 2018-07-31 at 4 21 08 pm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1777276/43492437-dacca70e-94dd-11e8-80c3-4e548611d561.png)
body_html: Changed the check to compare data_ptr for input and output Tensors. Tested that it works with views that share the same underlying storage:
